content.text:
# List of State Register of Heritage Places in the City of South Perth

The State Register of Heritage Places is maintained by the Heritage Council of Western Australia. , 189 places are heritage-listed in the City of South Perth, of which 20 are on the State Register of Heritage Places.
List
The Western Australian State Register of Heritage Places, , lists the following 20 state registered places within the City of South Perth:
